snippet.title: Viscerafest - Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
What would you do for "Love"?
Viscerafest leaves early access April 14th 2025
during the "Lovecraftian Days" Steam event!!!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/14...
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/viscerafest
Epic: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/v...

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/PfnXrMRJrV
Follow us on Twitter: https://x.com/Viscerafest

Viscerafest is a sci-fi fantasy single-player arena FPS where you take the role of Caroline, a bloodthirsty, psychopathic mercenary who wants nothing more than to marry her wonderful boyfriend, Athens Fetter. Problem is money's tight, and rings aren't exactly cheap. But thankfully, there may be hope for her, as a warlock named Cromune has acquired a rather hefty bounty on his head.
